Retrieved 12 October 2015. was a Nigerian novelist, playwright and director. Bandele was born in Kafanchan, Nigeria. He directed the 2013 movie Half of a Yellow Sun and the 2022 Netflix series Blood Sisters. Bandele died in Lagos, Nigeria on 7 August 2022 at the age of 54. ==References== ==Other websites== * The International Student Playscript Competition * Biyi Bandele-Thomas at Doollee.com: The Playwrights Database * "Writers: Biyi Bandele", The British Council * Encompass Books * Interview with Koye Oyedeji, BBC, Africa Beyond. * Al Jazeera English: "Interview: Biyi Bandele", YouTube. * Biyi Bandele at the Berlin International Literature Festival 2003 Category:1967 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Nigerian writers Category:Playwrights Category:Movie directors Category:Television directors Category:African novelists Category:People from Kaduna State
